summary: Julie Kohler is prevented from suicide by her mother. She leaves the town. She will track down, charm and kill five men who do not know her. What is her goal? What is her purpose?
cast: Jeanne Moreau|Michel Bouquet|Jean-Claude Brialy|Charles Denner|Claude Rich|Michael Lonsdale|Daniel Boulanger|Alexandra Stewart|Sylvine Delannoy|Luce Fabiole|Michèle Montfort|Jacqueline Rouillard|Paul Pavel|Gilles Quéant|Serge Rousseau|Van Doude|Christophe Bruno|Frédérique Fontanarosa|Renaud Fontanarosa|Jacqueline Gaillard|Maurice Garrel|Daniel Pommereulle|Elisabeth Rey|Jean-Pierre Rey|Dominique Robier|Jacques Robiolles|Michèle Viborel
keywords: french noir|euro noir|neo noir|statement in title|color in title
title: La novia vestía de negro
